title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 1 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 1 2022
description:
How and when will Dems back down from covid rules? Video proves California Governor Gavin Newson lied about wearing mask at NFL conference championship game, while having ordered others to do so. Psaki defends Biden's racist SCOTUS quota, Cruz crushes it. Infectious-disease scientist Dr. Margery Smelkinson, who co-authored phenomenal piece in The Atlantic, joins C&B to explain why we shouldn't mask kids in schools.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
